channel.title: Ad tools and AI on FinanClub

item.title: PINS
item.description: score:-44 Chances: Reported growth in monthly active user (MAU) base, up 8% YoY in Q2. Rebound potential with a return to user growth and focus on building better ad tools. Rise in revenue due to increasing user base, strength in emerging verticals, and AI integration.
